abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
affiliations: Key Laboratory of Molecular Imaging, CAS for their valuable discussion and comments. We thank all the patients involved in this study
author: Jie Tian; Xin Yang; Hui Hui; Hongjun Li; Xi Wang; Bingxi He; Li Li; Yingqian Zhang; Yundai Chen
title: Clinical and radiographic features of cardiac injury in patients with 2019 novel coronavirus pneumonia

award-group.funding-source: Key Laboratory of Molecular Imaging, CAS

funding.funding-statement: We thank all members of the Key Laboratory of Molecular Imaging, CAS for their valuable discussion and comments. We thank all the patients involved in this study.
